Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AchievementFileController
    Controller to save and load achievements so that they will be saved between sessions
    AchievementPanelController  
    EndLevelController
    When a level is done, this controller is run.
    ExitLightningLevelController
    This is a custom controller for quitting out of lightning levels, as doing so requires us to stop the timer for the level Other than that, the functionality is identical
    ExitSplashScreen
    A very basic controller, when the game starts up, the game shows a splash screen This controller allows you to click the splash screen and be taken to the main menu
    InitiateClearMoveController
    This is the controller attached to the "Clear" button in the top bar When it is pressed, it attaches a clearMoveController to the game board
    InitiateSwapMoveController
    This is the controller attached to the "Swap" button in the top bar When it is pressed, it attaches a SwapMoveController to the game board
    LightningCountdownController
    In a lightning level, this controller is run by the timer each second It decrements the time remaining, and checks if you are out of time When you are out of time, it ends the level
    MakeClearMoveController
    This is the controller bound to the board during a clear move.
    MakeSwapMoveController
    this is the controller bound to the board whenever the user wants to make a swap move Every time they click on a NumberTilePanel, it tries to add it to the move After two valid tiles, the move should be valid, and the two will swap positions
    MakeUserMoveController
    User moves are the default type.
    PastLevelViewController
    This controller is bound to the "Levels" button in the main menu When pressed, it takes the user to a view where they can see all of their past levels
    PlayPastLevelController
    The controller attached to each Level button in the PastLevelsView clicking on the button takes you to a LevelView for that level
    QuitController
    The controller to quit out of the application
    RearrangeBoardController
    The controller attached to the "Rearrange" button in the LevelView Pressing the button will replace all non-six
    ResetAchievementsController  
    ResetProgressController
    This controller resets all progress made so far.
    RestartLevelController
    This controller is bound to the "Restart" button in the LevelView When pressed, it restarts the level, and refreshes the gui.
    ReturnToMenuController
    When activated, this controller returns the User to the main menu by changing the active panel in the application frame to a new menu
    ShowCreditController
    This controller is bound to the "Credits" button in the main menu When triggered, it shows the user the splash screen
    TestSplashScreenController
